room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Annihilation" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: I researched a few escape rooms for a night out with a friend. I was looking for somewhere close to Herald Square and this location is about a block from Manhattan Mall. This was a great choice and we had so much fun! We'd never done an escape room before. By the time we arrived, the additional 10 people who signed up were waiting for us to come in!We did the Nuclear Annihilation room. If we had 5 more minutes, we could've escaped the room. There were so many puzzles, sounds, combinations to find. That hour you're allotted flies by! We enjoyed it and will likely do so again.

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Annihilation" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: I just finished playing Nuclear Annihilation and I have to say it was very fun.  The puzzles were challenging. I recommend this escape the room to anyone who wants to be intellectually challenged.

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Annihilation" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: I had a great time at Nuclear Annihilation! Rita was the most helpful and awesome clue master ever!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Annihilation" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Had a party of 8 for the Nuclear Annihilation room. It was fun strategizing before the game stressing teamwork and being organized with everything we found. We made it out with 46 seconds left! Looking forward to our next mission.
